div.p: D.S. developed the main concept, analyzed data and results, created Fig. 1, and wrote the text; A.M. and J.R. processed data, conducted numerical analyses, analyzed results, and contributed to writing the text; A.M. prepared Figs 2â€“4. J.R. prepared wind stress data. R. P. participated in discussion of the results, helped in editing the text, and provided logistic support and resources.
